summary:
Lucas: can't you atleast TRY to see things from my point of view?
Eliott, crouching down to Lucas' level: okay let's try...
body:
Lucas: can’t you atleast TRY to see things from my point of view?

Eliott, crouching down to Lucas’ level: okay let’s try this.

Lucas: fuck you!

(bonus)

Eliott: do it yourself coward!

blog.name: evakkkskammm
blog.title: Skam Fan... and some other stuff

summary: So excited to have received my awesome Skam France Merch!!! While I may not be a big fan of what’s happened to the show...
body:
So excited to have received my awesome Skam France Merch!!! While I may not be a big fan of what’s happened to the show recently…

SEASON 3 IS MY EVERYTHING ❤️🌈💙🌈❤️

My darling Elu came into my life at a time when I really needed them… and I couldn’t be more grateful ❤️🌈 ALT ER LOVE 🌈❤️

summary: Hey! How are? Hope you're having a good day/night 💙
question: Hey! How are? Hope you're having a good day/night 💙
answer:
hello!! i’m still alive and will be posting again soon, but i graduated today!! so thats why things have been quiet 💛 thank you for checking in!!

(tagging so people know i’m not dead lmao)

summary: So are we assuming that Manon thinks Lucas is the one who sent the email? Did Manon even check her email account to see when and...
question: So are we assuming that Manon thinks Lucas is the one who sent the email? Did Manon even check her email account to see when and what time it was sent or did Imane delete it? Cause I’m thinking Manon remembers giving Lucas her computer. But does that mean Lucas is gonna cover for Imane in this version or? Hmmmmm 🥺🤔
answer: I mean… I do think that’s the overall assumption, yeah.. 💀👀🥺

reblog.comment: I mean… I do think that’s the overall assumption, yeah.. 💀👀🥺

trail.content_raw: I mean… I do think that’s the overall assumption, yeah.. 💀👀🥺

If not stated otherwise, this is not a rec tumblr. ALT ER LOVE

title: Porcelain Doll
body:
by Caroxoxo

Lost art souls without knowledge that they need each other.
